abstract: Faster growth and recovery are being held back by uncertainty created by the high level of joblessness, the Fed chairman said.
snippet: Faster growth and recovery are being held back by uncertainty created by the high level of joblessness, the Fed chairman said.
lead_paragraph: COLUMBUS, Ohio  The Federal Reserve chairman, Ben S. Bernanke, found some respite on Tuesday from the second-guessing the central bank has faced since it announced a $600 billion effort to stimulate the slow recovery.

headline.main: Before Business Leaders, Bernanke Discusses Unemployment’s Toll on Americans
headline.print_headline: Before Business Leaders, Bernanke Discusses Unemployment’s Toll on Americans

abstract: Thomas F. O’Neill is leaving the investment bank to become chairman of Ranieri Partners Financial Services Group.
snippet: Thomas F. O’Neill is leaving the investment bank to become chairman of Ranieri Partners Financial Services Group.
lead_paragraph: Thomas F. O’Neill, a founder of Sandler O’Neill, is retiring from the investment bank to become chairman of Ranieri Partners Financial Services Group, according to an internal e-mail obtained by DealBook. Here is the e-mail, which was sent to the bank’s employees on Wednesday afternoon:

headline.main: A Founder of Sandler O’Neill Is Retiring
